original_text: Slaves who have masters who are also believers must continue to respect them. As believers, the slave and his master are like brothers together. But that slave must not refuse to obey his master because of that. Instead, he should work even better for his master. He should do that because he loves his master as a believer. Timothy Introduction
korean_text: 믿는 상전이 있는 자들은 그 상전을 형제라고 가볍게 여기지 말고 더 잘 섬기게 하라 이는 유익을 받는 자들이 믿는 자요 사랑을 받는 자임이라 너는 이것들을 가르치고 권하라
